pli-tv-prv1.12:1.1: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-prv1.12:1.2: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ catūhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
pli-tv-prv1.12:1.3: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena …pe…. #1
pli-tv-prv1.12:2.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-prv1.12:2.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ ekena āpattikkhandhena saṅgahitā—
